QuestData.Title: Jack Likes His Drink
QuestData.Description: Our next customer, Jack Adams, won't be the pushover that Harry was. He spends all day drinking with his friends, tough pirates all of them. Let's not use force this time, could get ugly.$B$BSee if you can use his drinking habit to your advantage. There's only so much alcohol someone can handle before passing out.$B$BMaybe one of the bar wenches will be of assistance. Once he's out, see if you can slip your hand into his pocket and get what's mine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Taruk at Scalawag Point in Howling Fjord wants you to collect Jack Adams' Debt.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm impressed, $n. And I'm not the type who's easily impressed.
